COMMON.OWNERSHIP_ERROR: This entity is not belong to this user.

COMMON.UNAUTHORIZED_ACCESS: You are not authorized to access this resource with your current role.

GENERIC.WRONG_USER_TYPE: You are not allowed to access this resource

LOGIN.SUCCESS: User has been successfully logged in!

USER.SUCCESSFUL_SIGNUP: User has been successfully signed up
USER.RESET_PASSWORD_CODE_SENT: The reset password code has been sent to your email address.
USER.RESET_CODE_NOT_FOUND: You cannot reset your password at this time. Please try the forget password process again.
USER.INVALID_OTP_CODE: The otp code does not match the one sent to your email. Please try again.
USER.OTP_CODE_EXPIRED: This otp code has been expired, please try again.
USER.PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESSFUL: Your password has been changed successfully.
USER.EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Your email address is not verified yet. Please verify your email address.
USER.EMAIL_ALREADY_VERIFIED: Your email address is already verified. Please log in to your account.
USER.EMAIL_CONFIRMATION_SENT: The verification code has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.
USER.NO_VERIFICATION_CODE_FOUND: You cannot verify your email address at this time. Please contact our support team.
USER.INVALID_VERIFICATION_CODE: The verification code does not match the one sent to your email. Please try again.
USER.EMAIL_VERIFIED_SUCCESSFULLY: Your email address has been verified successfully.
USER.ACCOUNT_DELETE_REQUEST: A verification email sent to your email
USER.DELETE_WHEN_IS_BUSY: You have an ongoing job. You must finish all aspect of it before deleting your account.
USER.DELETE_WHEN_HAS_REQUEST: You have an active job request. You must deactivate or resolve it before deleting your account.
USER.DELETE_WHEN_HAS_BID: You have an ongoing bidding. You must decline it before deleting your account.
USER.OTP_NOT_FOUND: There isn't any delete account otp code registered for you
